titleInfo.title: Information and discrimination: foundations and applications to credit and labor markets

mods.abstract: This thesis has been written within the program of European Doctorate in Economics - Erasmus Mundus (EDEEM), with the purpose of obtaining a joint doctorate degree in economics at the Department of Business Administration and Economics in Universit¨at Bielefeld and at the Department of Economics in Universit´e Paris 1 Panth´eon-Sorbonne.
